thread.title: See This Miss Universe Contestant Dance Like Nobody's Watching to Beyoncé's "Single Ladies"
thread.title_full: See This Miss Universe Contestant Dance Like Nobody's Watching to Beyoncé's "Single Ladies"

author: Brittney Stephens
title: See This Miss Universe Contestant Dance Like Nobody's Watching to Beyoncé's "Single Ladies"
text:
Miss Universe Contestant Dancing to Beyonce During Show 2017 See This Miss Universe Contestant Dance Like Nobody's Watching to Beyoncé's "Single Ladies" January 31, 2017 
— beyreigns (@beyreigns54) January 31, 2017 
There's a lot of "hurry up and wait" when it comes to large-scale televised events, and during the Miss Universe pageant dress rehearsals on Monday night, one contestant in particular found the perfect way to bide her time. As Beyoncé's "Single Ladies" blared from the speakers, the group of women took their places on stage — but Miss Netherlands, Zoey Ivory, couldn't just stand there. The 23-year-old began performing an impromptu dance routine, nailing the iconic video's choreography as best she could without stepping out of line. Her moves immediately caught the attention of eagle-eyed audience members, who shared video of Zoey to social media. You can just see how badly she's trying to restrain herself from getting down on the floor. 
After the clip of Zoey's moves went viral, she explained her hilarious actions to reporters . "They said we can relax during the rehearsal so when I heard the music I was just being me," she said. "At first I didn't even notice that people were looking at me. Then I started to hear the cheering and then I said, 'Oh my God, people are looking at me.' Then I went a little more full out." Oh, and she also confirmed that she is, in fact, a single lady . Related:
